lead_paragraph: DICK--Marion Pokoik. June 7, 1926 -Jan. 28, 2010 In loving memory of my beautiful Mother. Always thinking of you. Your beautiful smile and radiant personality lives on forever. Your Daughter, Gail 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  DICK, MARION POKOIK

snippet: DICK--Marion Pokoik. June 7, 1926 -Jan. 28, 2010 In loving memory of my beautiful Mother. Always thinking of you. Your beautiful smile and radiant personality lives on forever. Your Daughter, Gail 1/3
